mapper.insert: insert into board ( member_idx, title, content, fileName ) values ( #{member_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{fileName} )
mapper.select: select b.*, m.username as member_username from board B join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx order by b.idx desc
select b.*, m.userid as member_userid, m.fileName as member_fileName from board B join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where b.idx=#{idx}
